scholarships.name: Global Tech Innovators Scholarship
scholarships.description: Supports students demonstrating outstanding innovation in technology and software development. Recipients gain access to mentorship programs and internship opportunities with leading tech companies.
scholarships.eligibility_summary: Minimum 3.0 GPA required. Open to Computer Science, Software Engineering, and Information Technology majors. Innovation project portfolio required.

scholarships.name: STEM Women Empowerment Grant
scholarships.description: Encourages women to pursue education and careers in STEM fields by providing financial support and connecting recipients with female role models in science and technology industries.
scholarships.eligibility_summary: Female students in STEM fields including Engineering, Computer Science, Mathematics, Physics, Chemistry, or Biology. Personal statement essay required.

scholarships.name: Future Engineers Need-Based Scholarship
scholarships.description: Supports engineering students with demonstrated financial need, helping to remove economic barriers to quality engineering education and career advancement.
scholarships.eligibility_summary: Engineering majors with demonstrated financial need. Minimum 2.5 GPA required. Maximum family income $60,000.

scholarships.name: Green Planet Sustainability Scholarship
scholarships.description: For students dedicated to environmental protection and sustainability projects. Recipients participate in annual environmental conferences and receive networking opportunities with green industry leaders.
scholarships.eligibility_summary: Environmental Science, Sustainability Studies, Environmental Engineering, or Ecology majors. Minimum 3.2 GPA. Sustainability project proposal and essay required.

scholarships.name: Essay Excellence Scholarship
scholarships.description: Recognizes excellence in written communication and creativity. Winners receive publication opportunities in the foundation's annual anthology and access to writing workshops.
scholarships.eligibility_summary: Open to all majors. Requires 1000-word essay on creativity in education. No GPA minimum.

scholarships.name: First-Generation College Success Award
scholarships.description: Supporting first-generation college students in achieving their academic goals by providing financial assistance and comprehensive mentorship programs designed specifically for first-gen challenges.
scholarships.eligibility_summary: First-generation college students with financial need. Minimum 2.8 GPA. Maximum family income $80,000. Personal essay required.

scholarships.name: Business Leadership Excellence Scholarship
scholarships.description: Rewards outstanding academic performance and leadership potential in business fields. Recipients gain exclusive access to executive mentorship programs and leadership development workshops.
scholarships.eligibility_summary: Business Administration, Economics, Finance, Marketing, or Management majors. Minimum 3.5 GPA. Leadership experience and letters of recommendation required.

scholarships.name: Healthcare Heroes Scholarship
scholarships.description: Supporting future healthcare professionals dedicated to community service. Recipients participate in medical mission trips and receive career guidance from established healthcare professionals.
scholarships.eligibility_summary: Pre-Med, Nursing, Public Health, Pharmacy, or Medical Technology majors. Minimum 3.3 GPA. Community service hours and healthcare service essay required.
